Reviews.Title: Sony Alpha SLT-A65 DSLR Digital Camera with 18-55mm Lens Package 3
Reviews.Author: M. Raymond "Megan."
Reviews.Content: Perfect, came packaged really well.  Everything works perfectly.  I haven't had a chance to really try out the other lenses yet but the camera is great.  The digital veiwfinder is not good at night as the other reviewers have stated.  I'll keep my other camera for that.  I love how this is lightweight, still in my price range and 'newer' than my other camera which is 4 years old.

Reviews.Title: This was a great buy!
Reviews.Author: Mr. Randall E. Starman "STARSHIP"
Reviews.Content: If you like taking photos and want professional results, get this package, I also picked up Sony 55-300mm DT f/4.5-5.6 SAMTelephoto Zoom Lens. These are all you need to get started into some real beautiful photography, no matter the subject! Sony has premier quality lens and photo equipment, I swear by it!

Reviews.Title: Sony Alpha SLT-A65
Reviews.Author: Janster
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  Still experimenting with it, to learn all the ins and outs.  I wanted it  for closeups of art and jewelry; my husband wanted it for action shots of our grandchildren at play.  So far we are both happy.  The package deal was nice, although the camera bag wasn't great, but we feel the package was worth the price.

ProductInfo.Features:
2nd Generation Translucent Mirror Technology camera
24.3 MP for superb detail and amazing enlargements
Ultra-fast up to 10 fps continuous shooting with Auto Focus
World's first OLED viewfinder; big and bright
World's first HD Movie mode with AVCHD 60p/60i/24p
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Alpha SLT-A65 DSLR Digital Camera with 18-55mm Lens Package 3
